name: test_tea
description:
The Code Snippet Library is a comprehensive package that offers a collection of fundamental code examples for various programming languages such as JavaScript, Python, and Java. This library aims to simplify the development process by providing easily accessible snippets for common tasks like printing 'Hello, World!' and calculating factorial numbers in different languages.

  The main features of the Code Snippet Library include:
  
  - An organized repository of code snippets for JavaScript, Python, and Java.
  - Simplified access to essential code examples for beginners and experienced developers.
  - Easy integration into projects for quick reference and implementation of common programming tasks.
  
  By utilizing this library, developers can save time by utilizing these ready-to-use code snippets within their applications, aiding in the rapid prototyping and development process. The Code Snippet Library encourages contribution from the community to expand its repertoire and adapt to evolving programming practices and languages.
